comments.text:
Created attachment 8631438
PageNotFound-about-prefernces-privacy-tracking.png

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0
Build ID: 20150708030204

Steps to reproduce:

Please refer to the attached image "PageNotFound-about-prefernces-privacy-tracking.png"
1) Open "about:preferences#privacy"
2) Click "Learn More" link for "Prevent sites from tracking my online activity in Private Windows"


Actual results:

"Page Not Found" page appears


Expected results:

"Learn More" should be opened correctly.
comments.author: magicp.jp@gmail.com

comments.text:
